pkgmetadata.longdescription: # BrewBlox CLI management toolThe primary tool for installing and managing BrewBlox. Uses Click.Install-specific commands are defined in [brewblox-ctl-lib](https://github.com/BrewBlox/brewblox-ctl-lib).Wraps multiple docker-compose commands to provide a one-stop tool.Provides the `http` CLI utility tool as a more specific and less cryptic alternative to `curl`.
